title: React Movie Search App
description: This project was the part of React Basics cousre, from the The Front End Career Path from Scrimba. It's a simple app built using The Movie Database API and javascript fetch API.

title: Express Weather App
description: This project is built using Node Js and Express Js. I've used Template Engine (Mustache's HBS) to built header, nav and footer to make this app dynamic.

title: React To-Do App
description: This project was the part of React Basics cousre, from the The Front End Career Path from Scrimba. It's a simple app built using react hooks, props and more.
